news.title: Bank of America tops analysts' estimates on better-than-expected interest income, trading
news.summary: Bank of America shares have sold off in recent weeks on concern that President Donald Trump's tariff policies could cause a recession. Bank of America is the largest U.S. bank by market value.

news.title: U.S.' inability to replace rare earths supply from China poses a threat to its defense, warns CSIS
news.summary: The U.S. is unable to make up the shortfall, according to the Center for Strategic and International Studies. China imposes rare earths export controls.

news.title: Citigroup results exceed analysts' estimates on gains in fixed income and equities trading
news.summary: CEO Jane Fraser said Tuesday that the bank was continuing to earn credibility with investors. Fraser said she remains focused on executing on her strategy.

news.title: Treasury yields are little changed after recent volatility
news.summary: The action in yields comes amid a period of volatility in the bond market. The action in bond yields comes as the U.S. economy continues to struggle.

news.title: American Airlines to make Wi-Fi free on most of its fleet in 2026
news.summary: American Airlines is following other airlines such as Delta and JetBlue in making Wi-Fi free on board. American Airlines follows other airlines like Delta andJetBlue in offering free Wi- Fi on board planes.

news.title: Citigroup CEO is betting the U.S. economy can weather the tariff storm
news.summary: Citi’s Jane Fraser looks past the current trade-policy turmoil and says the dollar will retain its position as global reserve currency.

news.title: Stocks that benefit from chaos are helping a husband-and-wife investing duo beat the competition
news.summary: The Marshfield Concentrated Opportunity Fund is up in 2025 and beating the S&P 500 on a three and five year basis. Two of the portfolios managers dish the fund's secrets.

news.title: How do I apply for a tax-filing extension? What time are taxes due? Your last-minute Tax Day questions, answered.
news.summary: Tuesday is Tax Day, the last day to pay any owed income taxes. It’s also the final day to either file a tax return or claim an extension.

news.title: Why the usual advice about managing a stock-market plunge is dangerous now
news.summary: Don't assume you’ll always make money. Stocks for the long term? Don’t assume you will always be successful.

news.title: Americans are spending their tax refunds differently this year — and it says a lot about this economic moment
news.summary: The average refund is now $3,116, the IRS says. The average tax refund is $2,856. The IRS says the average tax return is $1,854.
